News.Title: Omkar Speciality Chemicals Monitoring Committee Holds First Meeting Following NCLT Approval
News.Summary: Omkar Speciality Chemicals Limited's Monitoring Committee held its inaugural meeting on August 13, 2025, following the National Company Law Tribunal's approval of the company's resolution plan on July 31, 2025. The committee appointed Ajit Kumar as Chairman and addressed key implementation matters including statutory compliances with ROC, GST, Income Tax, and stock exchanges, determination of fees for the Chairman, CIRP costs under process-related and going concern categories, and future action plans. The meeting also covered insurance claims and key events during the resolution plan implementation phase. The two-hour meeting concluded the initial setup phase of the monitoring process required under the approved resolution plan.
